headline: Trump's BORDER CZAR TOM HOMAN 🛡️🇺🇸 DROPS into MINNEAPOLIS 💥🚔!
text:
DONALD J. TRUMP 🍊🦅 unleashing his FIERCE BORDER TSAR 👑🛡️ TOM HOMAN 🔥😤 on MINNEAPOLIS after FED AGENTS 💪🔫 POPPED TWO US CITIZENS 😵💥 in LESS THAN A MONTH 🗓️😱! White House spilling the TEA ☕📢: Homan, 64yo NY BEEFCAKE 🥩🕶️ from UPSTATE SNOWLAND ❄️🌨️, now MAIN DADDY 👨‍💼💦 'on the ground' meeting CITY SIMPS 🤡🏙️ while GREGORY BOVINO 🥷📡 – the MASS DEPORT 🚀👋 BORDER PATROL BOSS – packs his BAGS 🧳✈️ and BOUNCES with his AGENT SQUAD 🕵️‍♂️👥!

Homan's LEGENDARY 🏆📜: Started as COP 🚔👮‍♂️ in '84, SLAYED southern Cali BORDER 🏜️🇲🇽, climbed ICE 🧊🔥 ranks under OBAMA 👴🕶️ as ENFORCEMENT REMOVAL BOSS 🧹🚪 by 2013! Planned RETIREMENT 🏖️🍹 in 2017 but JOHN KELLY 📞💥 called at his PARTY 🎉🥂: 'POTUS WANTS YOU BACK, BRO! 🫡🇺🇸' – Homan like 'HELL YEAH 💯🔥!' Same VIBE in 2024 with SUSIE WILES 📲👩‍💼 yanking him from RETIREMENT HEAVEN 😇☁️!

'BORDER TSAR' = INFORMAL GOD-KING 👑🛡️ overseeing MULTI-AGENCY IMMIGRATION MAYHEM 🚫👽 across DEPT OF HOMELAND SECURITY 🏰🛡️ – NO SENATE CUCKS 🤡✅ needed, STRAIGHT TRUMP PICK 🍆👍! VOWING to NAIL 'WORST OF THE WORST' 😈🚔 first, but SNAGS ALL ILLEGALS 👋🌍 cuz SANCTUARY CITIES 🏙️🚫 are SABOTAGING 🐍😠! 'BEING HERE ILLEGALLY IS A CRIME, DUH! 🧠💥' Homan ROARS at WH PRESSERS 🗣️📸 – 'DON'T TELL ICE TO GHOST ARRESTS UNLESS SERIOUS RAP SHEET 📜🔒 – THAT'S INVITING THE WORLD TO CRASH THE PARTY 🎉🚪!' 😤🌎

SEPT BOMBSHELL 💣📰: Bribery BEEF 🤑💰 ($50K from UNDERCOVER FEDS 🕵️‍♂️🤑) DROPPED 🚫📉 by DOJ when TRUMP 2.0 ROLLED IN 🥳🍊 – PRESS SEC KAROLINE LEAVITT 💅📢 calls it ENTRAP TRAP 🤏😈 on KEY ALLY! Meanwhile, BOVINO 🥷🌪️ – NC NATIVE since '96, CRACKDOWN KING 👑🔥 in LA/CHI/NOLA/MINN – 'TURN & BURN' 🚀🔥 swift ARRESTS before PROTESTERS 🪧😡 swarm! Spars with LAWMAKERS 🤼‍♂️🏛️ from BOTH SIDES 😠📢, answers to KRISTI NOEM 🏛️🐕 & MICHAEL BANKS/RODNEY SCOTT duo 🛡️📡!

WH SWAP 💥🔄 seen as POLITICAL GLOW-UP ✨😏 amid PUBLIC FREAKOUT 😱📱 – but LORA RIES @ HERITAGE 🏛️🔴 says 'HOMAN'S ICE VET 🧊💪 means BUSINESS AS USUAL – WORST FIRST, but ALL DEPORTABLES ON THE MENU 🍽️👋!' Activist MICHAEL LUKENS 😢🆘 calls him FAMILY SEPARATION ARCHITECT 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦💔 & 'POLISHED DEPORT DADDY 💅🗣️ better at SPINNING 🌀📺 than rough BOVINO!' No MODERATE HERE, bby – it's DEPORT ORGY 💦🚀 non-stop! TRUMP'S WALL STREET 🧱💰? Nah, BORDER WALL TSAR SLAYING 😍🔪! ‼️🇺🇸🦅
